channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: AirAsia food delivery off to slow start in Sâ€™pore; CEO Tony Fernandes says it will take time to grow
item.description:
July 23, 2021 1:11 AM

"We have only been in Singapore for a few months, I didn't say I was going to be number one," he said.

item.title: Marina Bay Sands casino closed till Aug 5 over Covid-19 cluster
item.description:
July 23, 2021 12:26 AM

Closure is to facilitate deep cleaning, but other outlets in the integrated resort are still open.

item.title: Professionalise all jobs, do away with PMET classification: MAS chief
item.description:
July 23, 2021 12:17 AM

Mr Ravi Menon said people ought to question the premise that all Singaporeans should aim to take up PMET jobs.

item.title: Boon Lay Place Food Village to shut till Aug 6 after 7 Covid-19 cases found
item.description:
July 23, 2021 12:16 AM

There were also five more cases added to the Marina Bay Sands Casino cluster, which now has 15 cases.

item.title: Jail for man who caused fire at Ang Mo Kio police headquarters with cigarette butt
item.description:
July 23, 2021 12:06 AM

The fire caused more than $5,300 in damage.
